metadata.synopsis: Two British buddies (Sidney James, Bernard Bresslaw) take their prim girlfriends to what they think is a nudist holiday camp.

reviews: Another entry in the Carry On series with the same cast doing the same things and getting the same laughs.
While sticking to its well tried, profitable formula, latest Carry on suffers somewhat in comparison to some of its predecessors in that it lacks a storyline, however slim.

Carry On Camping is a movie that proceeds partly by pratfall but mostly by a merciless succession of double entendres, which somehow excite the prurient interest of everybody except, perhaps, the audience.
Thin is certainly the word for this latest effort which scrapes the bottom of the barrel for gags.
